Project Report: AI-backed CV and Project Evaluator
- Implements prompt design and LLM chaining.
- Uses RAG (Qdrant + embeddings) to retrieve job description and scoring rubric.
- Handles long-running jobs with Redis/Asynq and retries with backoff.
- Provides structured JSON results and concise feedback.
- Includes tests, observability (Prometheus, OTEL), and docs.
